suggest.amasty/module-shiprestriction-mftf-2: Install module-shiprestriction-mftf-2 module to be able to run Shipping Restriction MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.6 and higher.
suggest.amasty/module-shiprestriction-mftf-3: Install module-shiprestriction-mftf-3 module to be able to run Shipping Restriction MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.1 and higher.
